name: Dreamland Defender
description:
Dreamland Defender is a crazy western cowboy sci-fi game, with flying saucers, spider robots, laser monoloiths, and large swarms of evil critters.
It is a lighthearted game that is easy to jump into and play, yet still difficult to master.

Dodge, deflect, defend. Fight to reclaim your abducted cows. Roomscale VR shooting game.
In this game some of the enemy AI evolves its skillset during play, and will get better at beating you as you get into the game.

You will need to turn, dodge and crouch to avoid attacks, while using the environment or simple things like the bullet deflecting umbrella to shield yourself from deadly plasma bullets. By fighting your way through the desert and down through a canyon full of ambushes and obstacles, you may be able to finally defeat the mothership and claim the title as the Dreamland Defender.
